item.title: Russian Central Bank Wants to Let Corporations Buy Foreign Stablecoins
item.description:
The Russian Central Bank has unveiled plans to allow domestic corporations to buy foreign stablecoins, but looks set to bar them from buying USDT and USD Coin (USDC).

item.title: U.S. Hearing Shoutout Sends Solana Memecoin $SKBDI Soaring 80% – Is Meme Coin Mania Back for Crypto?
item.description:
Skibidi Toilet Coin has vaulted 80% after Congressman Brad Sherman cited it alongside Bitcoin and Ethereum during a House Financial Services Committee hearing on crypto oversight, lifting the Solana-based meme token’s market cap toward $3.6 million and sparking fresh debate on meme coin resilience.

The post U.S. Hearing Shoutout Sends Solana Memecoin $SKBDI Soaring 80% – Is Meme Coin Mania Back for Crypto? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Crypto Price Prediction Today 4 June – Pi Coin, XRP, Solana
item.description:
Crypto price prediction assesses a market upswing after Bitcoin’s break to $111,814. Analysts have highlighted Pi Network’s mobile-mining model, XRP’s legal clarity, Solana’s ETF talk and AI-focused SUBBD as tokens that could outpace the field with potential 10 x moves if summer remains bullish.

item.title: China’s DeepSeek Predicts the Price of XRP, Pepe, and Cardano by End of 2025
item.description:

item.title: Smart Money Pours Into Best Wallet as Presale Hits $13M – Only 5 Hours Left to Join Current Round
item.description:
Best Wallet has exceeded $13 million in presale funding and will lift its token price in five hours. The multichain, self-custody wallet serves 250,000 users, offering an integrated DEX, Fireblocks MPC security and an ‘Upcoming Tokens’ finder that has flagged several recent high-gainers.

item.title: Trump-Affiliated World Liberty Financial Airdrops Millions in USD1 Stablecoin
item.description:
World Liberty Financial has surprised WLFI holders with a $47 USD1 stablecoin drop, moving over $4 million without claims or links. The live trial has proven its airdrop system and heightened scrutiny of Trump family ties as Congress debates stablecoin oversight.
